examples.sentence: The floating-point number consists of sign, exponent and m.
Check the m value when debugging the algorithm.
M stands for medium in CMYK printing.
New m platforms emerge like Douyin and Xiaohongshu.
5G networks operate in the mWave frequency band.
My new SSD has 1m IOPS performance.
Stephen Hawking made contributions to M theory.
Many programmers develop M-shaped hairlines by age 30.

examples.sentence: The hiker repaired his tent with a strip of mac.
Grandma keeps mac in her sewing kit for emergency fixes.
Londoners always carry their macs in unpredictable weather.
The detective's beige mac became his signature look.
'Hey mac, you dropped your wallet!' shouted the street vendor.
In classic films, private eyes often call strangers 'mac'.
Graphic designers swear by their Macs for creative work.
The new Mac crashed during my Zoom presentation.
He programmed a mac to automate spreadsheet tasks.
Using macros can save hours of repetitive work.
Mac users often tease Windows fans about blue screens.
After the breakup, she survived on mac and cheese for a week.
The Mexican Day of the Dead features macabre sugar skulls with colorful decorations.
His collection of macabre poems explores afterlife imagery.
The haunted house had a macabre atmosphere with fake blood stains.
That viral challenge has a macabre twist involving cemeteries.
His stand-up comedy combines macabre humor with social commentary.
The construction site was piled high with macadam for the new highway.
Children love collecting colorful macadam for their rock collections.
The vintage car bounced along the macadam road in the countryside.
Cycling on macadam requires special puncture-resistant tires.
The macaques in Mount Emei are notorious for stealing tourists' snacks.
Scientists discovered macaques using stone tools to crack nuts in Thailand.
Rhesus macaques contributed to the development of COVID-19 vaccines.
The cafeteria's macaroni with cheese sauce tastes like childhood memories.
My Italian grandma rolls macaroni dough with a bamboo stick.
Those macaronis in pastel wigs spent fortunes on imported snuff boxes.
Yankee Doodle called his feather 'macaroni' to mock British dandies.
The macaroni penguin's golden crest resembles overcooked pasta.
The macaw's rainbow feathers look like a flying Skittles bag.
Pirates in movies always have a macaw whispering secrets.
Macaw palm oil is used in premium cosmetics.
Indigenous tribes use macaw nuts as natural perfumes.
The blue-and-gold macaw can mimic smartphone ringtones perfectly.
The museum displayed a medieval mace with 20 iron spikes.
In Game of Thrones, the Mountain wielded a terrifying mace.
The Speaker's mace was placed solemnly in the Parliament.
British royal ceremonies always feature the jeweled mace.
The mace-bearer led the academic procession.
As the mace of the guild, he wore special robes.
The professor will carry the mace at this year's graduation.
The knight swung his mace and chain with deadly precision.

examples.sentence: The explorer used a machete to clear the jungle vines.
Grandpa's machete glinted in the sunlight as he trimmed the banana trees.
The zombie movie featured terrifying machete attacks.
He swung the machete like a professional coconut harvester.
The villain's machination to steal the crown jewels involved trained parrots.
His promotion was actually a machination to make him take the blame.
The escape required months of careful machination.
Her wedding proposal machination included fireworks and a live orchestra.
The bubble tea machine in my office makes 50 cups per hour.
Ancient Chinese invented the seismograph machine in 132 AD.
The lottery machine spits out tickets like a hungry panda.
This AI vending machine recognizes your face and recommends snacks.
The state machine operates with terrifying efficiency.
Our company is just a small cog in the global machine.
After 10 hours of meetings, he became a coffee-powered machine.
These delivery drivers work like machines during Double 11.
This precision part must be machined within 0.01mm tolerance.
We machine these Buddha statues from recycled aluminum.
TikTok's recommendation system uses advanced machine learning.
I bought hotpot ingredients from a 24/7 vending machine in Chengdu.

examples.sentence: The factory's new machinery can produce 10,000 dumplings per hour.
Ancient Chinese machinery like the south-pointing chariot amazed the world.
The lift machinery sounds like a panda chewing bamboo.
Watchmakers need magnifiers to handle tiny machinery.
The machinery of government operates slower thanå¿«é€’ during Double 11.
The legal machinery finally brought the counterfeit hotpot sauce makers to justice.

examples.sentence: The Porsche machinist repaired my car with LEGO-like precision.
A TikTok-famous machinist builds miniature engines from soda cans.
The machinist installed the robotic arm while eating xiaolongbao with chopsticks.
Our factory machinists can assemble IKEA furniture blindfolded.
The chief machinist solved the problem by hitting the machine with a hammer - gently.
Precision machining created the smooth surface of your smartphone.
CNC machining is revolutionizing traditional manufacturing.
The aerospace parts were produced in a 5-axis machining center.
His refusal to ask for directions was pure machismo.
The movie portrays machismo through shirtless motorcycle stunts.
The campaign aims to break down toxic machismo in sports culture.
Crying during sad movies doesn't contradict healthy machismo.
The patient was diagnosed with macho after returning from South America.
Macho lesions require specific antiparasitic treatment.
The sushi chef expertly filleted the mackerel with silver scales flashing.
Grandma's secret recipe for braised mackerel with brown sauce won our family cooking contest.
The mackerel sky at dawn promised a stormy afternoon.
Macro photography reveals the eyelash mites you never wanted to see.
WeChat's macro-program feature automates repetitive tasks.
The macro view of Shanghai skyline looks like a cyberpunk movie.
Xi'an's city wall presents a macro impression of ancient military defense.
Douyin's macro data analysis predicts next week's hot trends.
The macro flow of tourists during Golden Week resembles ant migration.
Huawei's macro lens can photograph the texture of mooncakes.
Li Jiaqi's lipstick sales became a macro economy indicator.
Ancient philosophers believed human body was a miniature of the macrocosm.
The James Webb telescope reveals splendors of the macrocosm.
The internet has become a digital macrocosm of human knowledge.
Her research covers the macrocosm of Asian civilizations.
Traditional Chinese medicine sees parallels between macrocosm and microcosm.

examples.sentence: China's macroeconomic policies successfully stabilized inflation during the pandemic.
The IMF report analyzes global macroeconomic trends with emoji charts ğŸ“Š.
GDP and unemployment rate are key macroeconomic indicators every citizen should understand.
Macrophages act like Pac-Man in your bloodstream, gobbling up bacteria.
When you get a splinter, macrophages swarm like hungry food delivery guys.
Alveolar macrophages protect your lungs like bouncers at a club.
The dinosaur fossil is macroscopic even without glasses.
Some microplastics have become macroscopic pollution in oceans.
We need macroscopic thinking when making national policies.
The macroscopic economy affects everyone's rice bowl.
The documentary provides a macroscopic view of Chinese urbanization.
